main event: An unidentified object was reported sighted in Hobart, Indiana in April 1967.
interesting points: The sighting lasted about 2 minutes,The object was seen moving from west to east on a clear day,The observer used binoculars to view the object,The object was described as bright in color and disc-shaped,The report mentioned that the object's speed was estimated to be 2.4 times that of jets.
witness description: An amateur astronomer and a 14-year-old male.
